mapper.select: /* selectDetailedWorkList */ SELECT WORK_SEQ , SECTOR , WORK_DATE , FR_WORK , TO_WORK , REMARK , USEFLAG , COMPANY_CODE FROM DETAILED_WORK_MST WHERE USEFLAG = #{useflag} AND WORK_DATE = #{work_date} AND COMPANY_CODE = #{company_code} ORDER BY WORK_SEQ ASC

/* selectContractList */ SELECT CONTRACT_SEQ , CONTRACT_DETAILS , CONTRACT_COMPANY , DATE_FORMAT(FR_DAY,'%Y-%m-%d') AS FR_DAY , DATE_FORMAT(TO_DAY,'%Y-%m-%d') AS TO_DAY , CONTRACT_YEARS , CONTRACT_DIVISION , FORMAT(PAYMENT,0) AS PAYMENT , REMARK FROM CONTRACT_MST WHERE USEFLAG = #{useflag} ORDER BY TO_DAY ASC

/* selectPaymentStatusCnt */ SELECT COUNT(PAYMENT_STATUS_SEQ) FROM PAYMENT_STATUS_MST WHERE USEFLAG = #{useflag} AND CREATED_DATE BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(LAST_DAY(#{frThisYear}),' 23:59:59'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(LAST_DAY(#{toThisYear}),' 23:59:59'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ORDER BY PAYMENT_STATUS_SEQ ASC

/* selectPaymentStatusList */ SELECT PAYMENT_STATUS_SEQ ,PRODUCT_NAME ,PRODUCT_UNIT ,IFNULL(CARRIED_FORWARD,0) AS CARRIED_FORWARD ,IFNULL(ENTER,0) AS ENTER ,IFNULL(EXODUS,0) AS EXODUS ,FORMAT(IFNULL(ENTER,0) + IFNULL(CARRIED_FORWARD,0) - IFNULL(EXODUS,0),0) THIS_MONTH ,USEFLAG ,REMARK FROM ( SELECT B.PAYMENT_STATUS_SEQ ,B.PRODUCT_NAME ,B.PRODUCT_UNIT ,IFNULL( ( SELECT FORMAT(IFNULL(CARRIED_FORWARD,0) + IFNULL(ENTER,0) - IFNULL(EXODUS,0),0) AS CARRIED_FORWARD FROM PAYMENT_STATUS_MST WHERE CREATED_DATE BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(LAST_DAY(#{frLastYear}),' 23:59:59'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(LAST_DAY(#{toLastYear}),' 23:59:59'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND B.PRODUCT_NAME = PRODUCT_NAME AND B.PRODUCT_UNIT = PRODUCT_UNIT limit 1 ) ,0) AS CARRIED_FORWARD ,B.ENTER ,B.EXODUS ,B.THIS_MONTH ,B.USEFLAG ,B.REMARK FROM PAYMENT_STATUS_MST B WHERE USEFLAG = #{useflag} AND CREATED_DATE BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(LAST_DAY(#{frThisYear}),' 23:59:59'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(LAST_DAY(#{toThisYear}),' 23:59:59'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ) A ORDER BY PAYMENT_STATUS_SEQ ASC

/* selectLiftList */ SELECT LIFT_SEQ , INSPECTION_DIVISION , INSPECTION_FIELD , BUILDING_NAME , INSPECTION_COMPANY , MAIN_MANAGER , SUB_MANAGER , DATE_FORMAT(INSPECTION_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS INSPECTION_DATE FROM LIFT_MST WHERE USEFLAG = #{useflag} AND INSPECTION_DIVISION = #{inspection_division} ORDER BY LIFT_SEQ ASC

/* selectLiftList */ SELECT LIFT_SEQ , INSPECTION_DIVISION , INSPECTION_FIELD , BUILDING_NAME , INSPECTION_COMPANY , MAIN_MANAGER , SUB_MANAGER , DATE_FORMAT(INSPECTION_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS INSPECTION_DATE FROM LIFT_MST WHERE USEFLAG = #{useflag} AND LIFT_SEQ = #{lift_seq} ORDER BY LIFT_SEQ ASC

/* selectLiftContentList */ SELECT LIFT_CONTENT_SEQ ,LIFT_SEQ ,DIVISION ,ITEM_CHECK ,RESULT_CHECK ,FR_WORK ,TO_WORK , DATE_FORMAT(SCHEDULE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS SCHEDULE_DATE FROM LIFT_CONTENT_MST WHERE USEFLAG = #{useflag} AND COMPANY_CODE = #{company_code} ORDER BY LIFT_CONTENT_SEQ ASC

/* selectTrainingList */ SELECT TRAINING_SEQ , DIVISION , TRAINING_DATE , TRAINING_PROGRESS , ATTEND_COUNT , TRAINING_CONTENT FROM TRAINING_MST WHERE USEFLAG = #{useflag} AND COMPANY_CODE = #{company_code} AND DATE_FORMAT(TRAINING_DATE,'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{fr_training_date},'%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{to_training_date},'%Y%m%d') ORDER BY TRAINING_SEQ ASC

/* selectMeetingLogList */ SELECT MEETING_LOG_SEQ , MEETING_LOG_DATE , MEETING_LOG_PROGRESS , ATTEND_COUNT , FILE_SEQ , COMPANY_CODE , (SELECT FILE_SEQ FROM FILE_MST WHERE TABLE_SEQ = MEETING_LOG_SEQ AND TABLE_NAME ='meetingLogMst' ORDER BY MEETING_LOG_SEQ DESC) AS FILE_SEQ , (SELECT FILE_NAME FROM FILE_MST WHERE TABLE_SEQ = MEETING_LOG_SEQ AND TABLE_NAME ='meetingLogMst' ORDER BY MEETING_LOG_SEQ DESC) AS FILE_NAME , (SELECT FILE_PATH FROM FILE_MST WHERE TABLE_SEQ = MEETING_LOG_SEQ AND TABLE_NAME ='meetingLogMst' ORDER BY MEETING_LOG_SEQ DESC) AS FILE_PATH FROM MEETING_LOG_MST WHERE USEFLAG = #{useflag} AND COMPANY_CODE = #{company_code}
/* "selectFile" */ SELECT FILE_SEQ , FILE_DATE , FILE_CONTENT , FILE_NAME , FILE_PATH , FILE_SIZE FROM FILE_MST WHERE FILE_SEQ = #{file_seq}

/* "selectFileList" */ SELECT FILE_SEQ ,FILE_DATE ,FILE_CONTENT ,FILE_PATH ,FILE_SIZE ,FILE_NAME ,TABLE_SEQ ,TABLE_NAME ,COMPANY_CODE FROM FILE_MST WHERE TABLE_NAME = #{table_name} AND TABLE_SEQ = #{table_seq} AND USEFLAG = #{useflag}
